pr_title: Don't call the non-ref allele in genotypes or ADs

timeline.author: davidbenjamin

timeline.bodyText: It seems a bit wrong to make() gb prematurely just to check the alleles.  Perhaps that's a sign that this logic should be moved into GATKVariantContextUtils.makeGenotypeCall a few lines up.
timeline.author: davidbenjamin

timeline.message: No-call anything with a NON_REF allele, PLs to zeros, AD modified
